quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was twenty years ago. The second best time is now.
It's not about how much money you make. It's about how much money you keep.
An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
Budgeting isn't about limiting yourself—it's about making the things that excite you possible.
Don't save what is left after spending; spend what is left after saving.
The goal isn't more money. The goal is living life on your terms.
Money often costs too much.
Beware of little expenses; a small leak will sink a great ship.
Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went.
The quickest way to double your money is to fold it over and put it back in your pocket.
Never spend your money before you have it.
Wealth is not his that has it, but his that enjoys it.
A penny saved is a penny earned.
Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
Your net worth is not your self-worth.
It’s not about how much money you make. It’s about how much money you keep.
The more you learn, the more you earn.
Never depend on a single income. Make investment to create a second source.
The stock market is designed to transfer money from the Active to the Patient.
Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
Money is a tool. Used properly, it makes something beautiful; used wrong, it makes a mess.
Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
Rich people plan for three generations. Poor people plan for Saturday night.
You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Financial literacy is just as important as the literacy to read and write.
If you live for having it all, what you have is never enough.
Don't let money run your life, let money help you run your life better.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
You can’t buy happiness, but you can buy a bicycle, and that’s pretty close.
The first rule is not to lose. The second rule is not to forget the first rule.
In investing, what is comfortable is rarely profitable.
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself.
Success is not just about what you accomplish in your life, it’s about what you inspire others to do.
It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
Money is a representation of your ability to create and serve.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
To achieve success, you have to work hard and be willing to take risks.
Every time you borrow money, you're robbing your future self.
Financial independence is about having more choices.
You don't need to be a genius to make money; you just need to know how to make a decision.
Make money your god, and it will plague you like the devil.
The goal of the investor should be to purchase the most extraordinary businesses at the best possible prices.
Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
You cannot climb the ladder of success dressed in the costume of failure.
If you want to be rich, you need to be financially literate.
Investing is laying out money now to get more money back in the future.
The rich invest in time, the poor invest in money.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
If you don't find a way to make money while you sleep, you will work until you die.
Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
The more your money works for you, the less you have to work for money.
The purpose of saving is to accumulate wealth over time.
It's not what you earn but what you keep that counts.
Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
Financial planning is the process of meeting your life goals through proper management of your finances.
What is important is not what you get, but what you become.
Your income is directly related to your philosophy, not the economy.
Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.
The first step towards financial freedom is to stop living paycheck to paycheck.
The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
A goal without a plan is just a wish.
Financial literacy is a crucial skill for anyone who wants to be successful.
The rich are always optimistic. They are always looking for the next big thing.
It's not about having money; it's about understanding money.
You must do the things you think you cannot do.
Wealth is not just about money; it's about having enough to live a full life.
You need to budget your time, not just your money.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
To be successful, you must act big, think big, and talk big.
It’s not how much money you make, but how much you keep.
Investing in yourself is the best investment you can make.
It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
Money is a great servant but a poor master.
There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
A financial education is a lifelong process.
Never let your emotions overpower your intelligence.
Investing is not about beating others at their game. It's about controlling yourself at your own game.
The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
Every man is a millionaire at twenty-five.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
Financial independence is about having enough money to live without working.
The money you make is a symbol of your life force.
Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
If you don't manage your money, money will manage you.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
